title: Tech Intensive Dairy Sector can become more Sustainable - Daily Pioneer
content: Tech Intensive Dairy Sector can become more Sustainable  Daily Pioneer
description:
The current start-up and technology revolution will need to transform the resolution to adapt modernisation thus pushing nano-steps towards achieving the Second White Revolution in the country, writes Kishore Indukuri

Dairy sector in the post Covid time is just about limping back to life after
